name: Raptor Pack - Alpha
text: If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: you can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 Reptile "Raptor Pack" monster from your Deck. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can target 1 Dinosaur-type monster and 1 Reptile-type monster in your GY; add them to your hand, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Raptor Pack - Alpha" once per turn.
